header: Get a drug manufacturer's prescription co-pay assistance or drug savings program.
partial_content:
Tap on "FYI" for search tips and "FAQ" for Q and As.
Improve the savings card database by suggesting a program or report a broken link.
footer: Suggest A Savings Card
page1:
FYI:

  • Manufacturer's coupons has limits on how much they can take off. For this reason, $4 copay does not mean $4 copay. You are responsible for anything above the maximum payable amount.
  • All do not apply to Government programs such as medicaid, medicare, Federal employee, Tricare and so on.
  • Some programs require:
    - You to fill out forms
    - You to print the coupon
    - Downloading the coupon as a PDF
    - Sending the coupon to your email.
page2:
FAQ:

  • No drug savings found?
    - May have expired
    - Check the drug name. Just 3 xters will do
    - Manufacturer has no coupon.
  • Broken link to program?
    - Please Contact Us with the drug name. Help us improve accuracy.
  • Can I still use coupon after filling my Rx?
    Your pharmacy may be able to rebill your prescription with this coupon if not more than 10 days. But you have to ask politely. There is no obligation to.
